post:
Hi everyone, We are excited to let you know, we have opened another location within Equinix TY8!

To celebrate the launch of the JP location we’ve prepared a promotional offer. Please use the こんにちは promotional code at the checkout for 30% off recurring price on ANY of our virtual servers in Tokyo, valid until 30th Sep 2021.

Offer

S2N-1C1G

  • CPU: 1 vCore
  • RAM: 1GB DDR4 ECC
  • Disk: 16GB RAID1 NVMe SSD
  • Data Transfer: 1TB
  • Uplink: 2x40Gbps capped at 10Gbps

Price: $7 / mo $10 / mo
Use Coupon: こんにちは
Order

Higher plans can be found on our website.

:-D

Double memory when paid annually, PM us with your Order ID to get it

Datacenter & Network Information

Datacenter: Equinix TY8
Transit: CDN77 (NTT, PCCW, Telia, Cogent, TATA), GSL Networks, SoftBank, Cogent
Peering: Equinix Tokyo, BBIX Tokyo

NETWORK PERFORMANCE TO MAINLAND CHINA IS NOT OPTIMAL, PLEASE CONSIDER THIS BEFORE PLACING AN ORDER

Though Softbank is included in our transit blend, it won’t be enabled for all destinations (especially China Telecom / China Unicom) due to cost issues. Tickets regarding changing routes to SoftBank will be ignored.

Test IP: 103.170.232.255 / 2a0b:4341:b02:222:5054:ff:feb8:56eb
Traceroute: MTR | Ping.Sx
Speedtest: WiFiman.com

Highlights of our services

  • Intuitive, fast, in-house developed platform MC²
  • IPv6 /64 subnet by default
  • Reverse DNS (PTR) configuration via WebUI / API
  • Daily built OS images with latest updates and patches (including Windows) Linux daily build is partially broken, will get it fixed soon
  • First-class Support of BGP sessions and IPv6, they’re working in all our locations except Seoul
  • We own all hardware and IP space and operate our own network
